metadata.title: CVE-2016-5697 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Ruby-saml before 1.3.0 allows attackers to perform XML signature wrappingattacks via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-saml - 1.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-saml package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0-1').
